text: Routes and streets z Address the barrier of Aspen Way and integrate the site with Poplar High Street to the north, and the Canary Wharf Elizabeth line station and the Canary Wharf estate to the south. These routes should align with the existing urban grain to support permeability and legibility. z Improve walking and cycling connections to and from the site, accommodating a new east-to-west pedestrian route through the site which facilitates connections to the wider movement network and the DLR and underground stations adjoining the site.
